org.wallerlab.yoink.api.service.math

Interface Matrix<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - the matrix type in the library
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonsMatrix

    public interface Matrix<T>
    It is an interface for external Matrix libraries. It contains methods about matrix and enum Matrix.Type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Matrix.Type
      matrix type is named after the library it is in.
